answers.answer: I've done 2 of the 24hr collections this pregnancy due to protein in my urine.  It's a pain in the butt since you have to be at home but not difficult at all. I really couldn't leave the house at all that day since I was always using the restroom.

Yes!!  I went to my prenatal appointment  last week and I talked about my swelling... They then checked my blood pressure and it was abnormally high. I had to do the 24 hour urine so I had to stay over night at the hospital to be monitored.  They then sent me home. Then on Monday went back for a prenatal appointment. Again bad swelling and very high blood pressure. I have severe preeclampsia  So I am not aloud to leave the hospital until I deliver my baby. I'm 33 weeks now and they want me to deliver him on Monday when I'm 34 weeks!

Hello i will b 35 weeks tomorrow and i am just recently starting to swell in my feet and calves pretty bad at times. My doc said same thing as long as bp is low than u r fine however they told me if any number is higher than 140/90to get checked asap

question: I have been experiencing really bad swelling in my feet and legs but the Dr said as long as my blood pressure was normal it's not dangerous. Well at today's Dr app my blood pressure was 147/93. So she ordered a 24hr urine collection for protein detection. Has anyone else had to do this?
title: Preeclampsia? ?
